entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
